detailed_findings.context_before: I've used services like Instacart and Amazon Fresh, but I'm open to new recommendations that meet my criteria.

detailed_findings.context_before: My city and state are [insert your city and state here]; please suggest local grocery delivery services that focus on organic products.
detailed_findings.context_after: I look forward to receiving the recommendations soon!

contextual_notes: The user has experience with online grocery services but is seeking updated and specific recommendations.

general_insights: Providing specific and tailored recommendations can significantly enhance user satisfaction.

Localized information is highly valued by users looking for services in their area.
